sentence.Network_en: Athene's horse stood grim and gaunt and motionless beside the temple wall.
sentence.Network_cn: 阿西妮的马凶恶地、吓人地、一动不动地立在庙墙旁边.

sentence.Network_en: Let us offer thanks to our protector , the wise and kind Athene.
sentence.Network_cn: 让我们来感谢我们的保佑者,贤明而仁慈的雅典娜神.

sentence.Network_en: An important Greek festival of Athene, the Panathenaea was dated from the days of king Theseus.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个祝贺雅典娜仙女的希腊重要节日,泛雅典娜节, 要追溯到特修斯国王时期.
